content.query:
-- error handling change version 2.0 to 1.0
select 
     *
from
    openrowset(
        bulk 'https://synapsecourseadls25.dfs.core.windows.net/my-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        format='csv',
        firstrow=2,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n',
        PARSER_VERSION='1.0'
    )
    with(
        locationID smallint 1,
        borough varchar(15) 2,
        zone varchar(50) 3,
        service_zone varchar(15) 4
    )
    as [result]
